full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DREGS PA SDE BRGYAD LA GSER SKYEMS GTONG BA'I CHO GA BDUD RTZI'I RLABS PHRENG ZHES BYA BA DANG, ,RTA MCHOG ROL PA'I RNAL 'BYOR PAS, ,MCHOG DMAN 'GRON LA GTOR MA DANG, ,GSER SKYEMS BSANGS SOGS GTONG BA'I SKABS SU 'DOD GSOL KHA BSGYUR BYED TSUL BZHUGS SO, , *, ,DREGS PA SDE BRGYAD LA GSER SKYEMS GTONG BA'I CHO GA BDUD RTZI'I RLABS PHRENG ZHES BYA BA NI,
